thread.title: Herbicides and lush lawns don’t go together
thread.title_full: Herbicides and lush lawns don’t go together - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Herbicides and lush lawns don’t go together
text:
October 9 at 7:41 PM I am afraid that Peter Kramer had it backward in his Oct. 3 letter, “ Protecting the public from pesticide exposure .” He stated that he would keep his kids away from “lush green lawns” so they would not be exposed to Roundup. Roundup is an herbicide that kills grass. If he sees a lush green lawn, he can be sure it has not been exposed to Roundup.
Kate Baldwin , Bethesda
